# Affiliate Program

We pay 25% commissions for every order placed using your custom affiliate link by tracking visitors you refer to us using a cookie. The cookie will last up to 180 days following the initial visit, so you will get a commission for the referral even if they do not sign up immediately.

## Sign up for an account: https://my.hostcram.com/order/main/index/register

All questions are answerable via [support ticket](https://my.hostcram.com/dashboard/plugin/support_managerpro/client_tickets/departments/ "support ticket") and [live chat](https://www.hostcram.com/ "live chat").
